content: > free blog version here 1 > > paid pdf options in my shop 2 on > etsy 3 on payhip 4 about the pattern ----------------- use this tunisian crochet houndstooth pattern to make elegant mittens with a perfect fit due to the thumb gusset construction to make the pattern stand out pick two colors of yarn with strong contrast and use a smaller hook than usual all of these considerations are discussed in the video tutorial in which i show you how to make the stitches and where and how to switch the yarn colors skill level ----------- beginner in tunisian crochet you use one color at a time with two very basic tunisian crochet stitches the tunisian simple stitch and the tunisian purl stitch measurements ------------ see the attached table in the pattern photos the table provides approximate sizes for the length of the mitten circumference between 15-28 cm or 6-11 length between 16-21 5 cm or 6 25-8 5 length adjustable thumb circumference between 6-8 5 cm or 2 3-3 3 materials --------- use a springy or elastic yarn with high twist such as a high twist merino yarn as this property of the yarn will make the mittens slightly elastic and more comfortable to put on and wear * yarn dk weight or size 3 with 200-250 meters per 100 grams in 2 colors approximate usage per size 40 46 50 56 60 66 g per pair or 100 110 120 140 150 160 meters half for each color * hooks 5 5 mm tunisian crochet or straight hook 3 5 mm regular crochet hook * tapestry needle scissors * optional 2 stitch markers for the thumb 1 m elastic thread for the cuff 1 https //yarnandy com/tunisian-crochet-houndstooth-pattern/ 2 https //shop yarnandy com/houndstooth-fingerless-mittens-tunisian-crochet-pattern/ 3 https //yarnandy etsy com/listing/1879168419 4 https //payhip com/b/3n9qy
